article.title: Local Events in Your Region of Florida
article.summary: Learn about local events being held by the Florida U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​​Each of our offices provides or participates in local events to promote or learn about different topics in international trade. These events can be general topics, overseas markets specific briefings, or industry related seminars.

To see events in your area visit:

  • Fort Lauderdale
  • Jacksonville
  • Miami
  • Orlando​​
  • Tallahassee
  • Tampa Bay

Additionally, please visit our worldwide events section to search for events outside your area and to search by either industry or country. To search for worldwide events, click on the link to the left.

Webinars are a popular and cost effective way to get specific topic information. To search Webinar, click on the link to the left.
article.seometadatatitle: Local Events in Your Region of Florida
article.seometadatadescription: Learn about local events being held by the Florida U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
